section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Al-Bara' reported that a garment of silk was presented to Allah's Messenger (ï·º). His Companions touched it and admired its softness; there- upon he said:Do you admire the softness of this (cloth)? The handkerchiefs of Sa'd b. Mu'adh in Paradise are better than this
